summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of portions of North 85th Street at existing grade, all as a part of the North 85th Street/Aurora Avenue North Widening project; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, including property and property rights necessary for cut and fill slopes on certain abutting properties; and, providing for payment for the Arterial City Street Fund or from such other law, which funds shall be partially reimbursed to the maximum amount allowable by law from funds received from the Urban Arterial Trust Account Fund.
